name: Hoverboards VR
description: Hoverboards VR is a light-cycle-like game of 3D snake in VR! Hoverboards VR uses a unique locomotion technique that translates a player's movements within their play-space into movement of the board itself, mimicking the natural feel of surfing or snowboarding.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 500 MB available space
